First mate – Your starting deck contains “The [i]Scarlet Scourge[/i]” and no nonlegendary creature cards without flying. [i](If this card outside the game is your chosen first mate, you may swap it with a card in your opening hand.)[/i]
Whenever a Dragon or Drake you control deals damage to an opponent, exile the top card of your library, then you may have Captain Polly Carver deal 1 damage to that player. If you don’t, you may play that card from exile this turn.
